<b>Example for usage:</b> VK.box('box', 'My box', 500, ['box.php', {foo: 'bar'}], [{style: 'gray', label: 'Close', onClick: function(){VK.box('box', false);}}], {callback: onBoxCreate, onHide: function(){alert('Good luck!');}})<br>
Manipulation with show/hide box: VK.box('box', true/false);<br>
<br>
Name: first argument, unique identificator for messagebox<br>
Title: name, of course<br>
Width: width of messagebox<br>
Content: string/array with arguments for load from url<br>
Buttons: array, including object with the parameters<br>
{{{
Style: string, gray/blue
Label: string
onClick: function
Options: sixth argument, object
}}}
